title: Heart of a Lion
description: A Hot Shifter Romance  Lynn is a travel writer and photographer and she gets to see the world from a different view than others. She has always been considered adventurous, but the one thing that she hasn’t had the privilege of doing is going on safari in Africa. Her editor tells her that he needs her to do exactly that and she is tickled pink, but remains professional and detached. When she gets to Africa, she’s taken out to the plains and unfortunately there is an accident that kills her guide and leaves her alone. She meets a young man of African descent. He’s bald and he takes her underneath his wing, never truly knowing the consequences of bringing not only a white woman, but a human white woman back to the tribe and his arms.  ••• This is a standalone erotic fiction story, no cliffhanger •••   FREE BONUS SERIES INSIDE   *This book contains mature themes and language. Only suitable for ages 18+
author: Anna Collins
